categories.title: Getting Started
content: Need is a powerful Discord bot designed to elevate your server with moderation, utility, and customization features. To begin, invite the bot using the button above and ensure it has the appropriate permissions.

categories.title: Permissions Required
content: • Manage Roles – For moderation and auto-role features
• Manage Messages – To delete messages with moderation commands

categories.title: Command Prefix
content: By default, Need uses / slash commands. No prefix configuration is needed. Simply type / in your server to see available commands.

categories.title: Features Overview
content: • Moderation: Ban, kick, mute, warn, slowmode, etc.
• Voice Control: Lock/unlock voice channels, auto move, VC mute
• Custom Responses: Add reactions or replies to messages

categories.title: Need Help?
content: Join our Support Server for detailed guides, FAQs, and community support.
